name: Fighting Saga
description:
Fighting Saga - it's a fighting game inspired by a YouTuber called "gamesplusjames". It's all about 2 players fighting each other with snowballs and see who wins!

Player 1 controller:

A-D and Space for jumping/// F for shooting

Player 2 controller:

Right/left arrow to move and Upper arrow to jump/// L for shooting

Head into the battle!
